original_text: And be not ye like your fathers, and like your brethren, which trespassed against the Lord God of their fathers, who therefore gave them up to desolation, as ye see.
korean_text: 너희 조상들과 너희 형제 같이 하지 말라 그들은 그의 조상들의 하나님 여호와께 범죄하였으므로 여호와께서 멸망하도록 버려 두신 것을 너희가 똑똑히 보는 바니라

sentences.original_text: And be not ye like your fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 너희 조상들과 같지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: which trespassed against the Lord God of their fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 자기 조상들의 주 하나님께 범죄하였으니

sentences.original_text: who therefore gave them up to desolation
